title: New passenger cars sales in Canada 2020
summary: This graph represents the rate of New passenger cars in Canada during the 2020 year .
It starts at 4 thousand dollars in January , and has a sharp increase to 6.5 thousand dollars in March .
It continues to increase until it 's just under 7 thousand in May .
gold: This graph illustrates the monthly passenger cars sales in thousands of dollars in Canada in 2020 . There was a steep decline in the month of April , but in May the sale 's jumped back up to a value slightly higher than the recorded value for the month of march . In June there was another significant increase in sales , but in October it began to fall again .
